text: To measure cytotoxicity , EL4 thymoma target cells were loaded with 0 or 1 muM Gp33 peptide for 2 h before a 2-h coincubation with P14 <extra_id_0> CD8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells at the effector-to - target ratios indicated in the figures in 96-well round-bottom plates .

After the coincubation period , cells were stained with <extra_id_0> Annexin V <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - FITC and anti - <extra_id_0> CD8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - allophycocyanin .

Data analysis was performed with FlowJo software ( Tree Star , Inc . ) ; EL4 target cells ( <extra_id_0> CD8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - negative events ) were gated , and the percentage of <extra_id_0> Annexin V <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + target cells was determined .
